item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 06 Jun 2023
item.description:
1. Meetup group in New York City
  2. Creating a tutorial on sequences
  3. new release: Merlin 4.9
  4. Taking Inventory of the OCaml Ecosystem on OCaml.org
  5. New release: DocuLib 1.3.5
  6. opam 2.1.5 release!
  7. dune 3.8.0
  8. Second alpha release of OCaml 5.1.0
  9. ML'23: ACM SIGPLAN ML Family Workshop — Call for presentations
  10. qcheck-lin and qcheck-stm 0.2
  11. Melange 1.0 – compile OCaml / ReasonML to JavaScript
  12. Debugging Native Code in "Second OCaml" YouTube Video
  13. Sandmark nightly now supports latency profiling
  14. Update on Eio (effects-based direct-style IO for OCaml 5)
  15. Initial Emissions Monitoring of the OCaml.org Infrastructure
  16. Other OCaml News
